1231500.name: Secret Admirer
1231500.description:
Secret Admirer is a short, indie, horror game. You play as a newly divorced woman, trying to make the best out of the holiday, but your secret admirer has other plans.

Features:

-first person exploration: You play as the main character Jackie, spending an evening alone at home.

-atmospheric horror: The sounds and background images drive the horror element in this game.

Game Story:
After a long day at work, Jackie is ready to be home. First, she stops at her local liquor store to buy a nice bottle of wine. Once home, she pours a glass and starts watching her favorite show when she hears a knocking at the door. Excited about who the person could possibly be, stopping by on Valentine's day, her night begins.
1231500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
